text: Duracell is a brand of batteries made by Procter and Gamble. Duracell makes alkaline batteries of 9V, C, AA, AAA, and D sizes. In 2014, Berkshire Hathaway bought the Duracell. == History == The company was founded in the 1920s by Samuel Ruben and Philip Rogers Mallory. The Duracell became a brand appeared in 1964.The Gillette Company bought Duracell in 1996. ==Other websites== *Duracell's Official website == References == Category:Electronics companies of the United States Category:Batteries Category:1924 establishments
title: Duracell
